song_name: When You Got A Good Thing
lyrics:
9 contributorswhen you got a good thing lyricsverse 1 charles kelley
everybody keeps tellin me im such a lucky man
lookin at you standin there i know i am
barefooted beauty with eyes that blue
the sunshine sure looks good on you i swear

verse 2 hillary scott
oh i cant believe i finally found you baby
happy ever after after all this time
oh theres gonna be some ups and downs
but with you to wrap my arms around im fine

chorus charles kelley  hillary scott
so baby hold on tight
dont let go
hold on to the love were making
cause baby when the ground starts shaking
you gotta know
when you got a good thing

verse 3 charles kelley  hillary scott
you know you keep on bringing out the best in me
and i need you now even more than the air i breathe
you can make me laugh when i want to cry
this will last forever i just know i know
see lady a liveget tickets as low as 205you might also likechorus charles kelley  hillary scott
so baby hold on tight
dont let go
hold on to the love were making
cause baby when the ground starts shaking
you gotta know
when you got a good thing

bridge charles kelley  hillary scott  together
we got a good thing baby whoa
so hold on tight
baby dont let go
hold onto the love were making
cause baby when the ground starts shaking
you gotta  know oh you gotta know
oh you got to gotta know you gotta know
when you got a good thing

outro charles kelley  hillary scott
we got a good thing baby
oh whoa
whoa oh
whoa oh
whoa ohembed
